name: Apartments Fio

reviews.title: Cheap, clean and basic at Apartments Fio
reviews.text: I spent a couple of weeks travelling in croatia with my boyfriend and was looking for somewhere on a young person's budget to stay in Hvar. I emailed a few apartments and most of them were charging €50-80 a night as it was peak season.

I emailed Fio through their website (which is about five years out of date) and didn't reallt expect a reply. Thankfully the next day I had an offer of an apartment at a bargain €35 a night - so much cheaper!
reviews.title: family atmosphere

description: Stone house, property of family Fio, positioned on the hill St.Caterina, a few minutes walking distance from the center of the city of Hvar. Offers rooms and apartments with bed & breakfast treatment. The distance from the beaches is around 300 mt. All rooms and apartments have their own bathroom and balcony. Apartments are air-conditioned & TV-sat. Property is surrounded with lush vegetation & olive trees perfect for your complete relaxation.
